item.description:
There IS a meeting this Saturday at my house. I know I'm late with this info, but please feel free to drop by any time between 1 and 4pm. I have no idea what kind of food we will have. The weather looks OK so we can sit out on my back porch and watch the puppies play. Please RSVP if you can so we can plan food. Meeting fee is optional.

Thanks!!

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: There's a new sign for the front of the house. Check my website for directions: www.theidledog.com
item.why: The food can be great, the company is friendly, and the dogs are wicked cute.

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs May Meeting
